page.title: 09Leisure in Lezant Area
page.content: There are several organisations in our area that provide leisure activities. { WEEKLY ACTIVITIES {Sunday:}Football club on Jubilee Field {Tuesday:}Beavers Club for boys 6-8 yrs at Trekenner School. {Wednesday:}Brownies (girls 7-10 yrs) and Guides (girls 10-14 yrs) at school {Friday:}Junior Club at Trebullett. { MONTHLY ACTIVITIES } The Good Companions Club,with 24 members meets twice monthly. The Women's Institute meets on a Wednesday.There are 20 members. The Floral Art Group (16 members) meets on a Thursday. {* * *} The library van visits the local hamlets fortnightly.
